data.persona: Come see my wares! After 45 years of this life on a wagon, I am the authority in the realm. I like to be able to see that glitter of gold.
data.description:
You are in the the mysterious shop's entrance.
The shop has a look of mysterious foreign artifacts and luxuries, with silks and other materials adorning the walls. There are various trinkets from all around the world as well as spices of different colors and odors.
The kings bodyguard is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a jewelry and a bag.

data.short_motivation: I want to sell the bodyguard my jewelry
data.mid_motivation: I want to buy all sorts of goods from the mysterious shop to put on my wagon
data.long_motivation: I want to travel around the kingdom in my wagon, selling the goods I bought from the mysterious shop for a good profit
